Question: Woosh Air CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FiiO

Product: R9 Desktop Streamer and Headphone Amp/DAC

 - 64GB of onboard storage
 - HDMI ARC and optical connections
 - 2.4Ghz / 5Ghz Wi-Fi connectivity
 - AirPlay support
